How we can do to send some money to turn for credit so we dont have to be paying with credit cards all days?

To add ad credits to your account, you can use the Prepay option. Here's how you can do it:
1. Access the Billing Section in your account.
2. Under Ad Credits, click on â€˜Add ad credits.â€™
3. Select the amount of ad credits you would like to purchase.
4. Provide your credit card information and pay.
Ad credits are used before your primary payment method and they do not expire, so it's a great way to manage payments without using a credit card daily.
For more detailed information, you can check out our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide). Let me know if you have any other questions!
It says you have to give me access to that feautre

To gain access to the ad credit feature, your account needs to meet certain conditions:
1. Complete and pass business verification.
2. Accumulate over $5,000 in spend on your account or campaign.
3. Establish a relationship with an Account Manager (AM), who can then request the ad credit functionality to be enabled for you.
If you believe you've met these requirements or need further assistance, please contact our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They'll be happy to help you out!

Okay, Let's start fresh! What can I help you with?
Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
I transfered 5k to your accounts to refund the account

It seems like you're trying to add ad credits or make a payment. If you have transferred funds and are facing issues, I recommend contacting your bank to ensure the transaction was successful. Additionally, please reach out to our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance with your account. They will be able to help you resolve any issues related to payments or refunds.
can I speak with someone here?
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
can i speak with a human?

I understand you might want to speak with a human, but I'm here to assist you with any questions or issues you have. Please let me know how I can help, and I'll do my best to provide the information or support you need.
how can I speak with a human

While I can't transfer you to a live agent, I'm here to help with any questions or issues you have. If you need further assistance, you can email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for more help.
